org.jhove2.module.format.arc.properties
Class ArcRecordBaseProperties

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.core.reportable.AbstractReportable
      org.jhove2.module.format.arc.properties.ArcRecordBaseProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reportable
@Persistent
public class ArcRecordBaseProperties
extends AbstractReportable

Reportable properties class for a common ARC record base.

Author:
nicl

getIpAddressVersion

@ReportableProperty(order=5,
                    value="Ip-Address version.")
public String getIpAddressVersion()
Report ip-address format as found in the ARC record, either nothing, 4 or 6.

Returns:
nothing, 4 or 6 depending on the ip-address format
